meanings.definition: Thin slices of meat rolled around a filling, typically cooked in tomato sauce.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious bracioles for Sunday dinner.
meanings.sent2: The Italian restaurant served bracioles with a side of pasta.
meanings.sent3: At the family gathering, everyone fought over the last braciole on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of simmering bracioles filled the kitchen, making everyone's mouth water.
meanings.sent5: The bracioles were so tender, they practically melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: Tonight's special is a hearty bracioles dish.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the bracioles from the menu and it was delicious.
meanings.sent3: The bracioles were the star of the dinner party, receiving compliments from all guests.
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret recipe for bracioles made them stand out from other dishes on the menu.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bracioles cooking in the kitchen made everyone eagerly anticipate the meal.

meanings.sent1: We enjoyed a variety of bracioles at the Italian festival.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed different types of bracioles available for order.
meanings.sent3: The bracioles on the platter looked like little meaty rolls of goodness.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering bracioles wafted through the air, enticing passersby.
meanings.sent5: The bracioles were a hit at the potluck, disappearing within minutes of being served.
